PlantingGuide.plantingDepth: Same depth as nursery bag, ensure root collar is at soil level
PlantingGuide.spacing: 8-10 meters between trees for timber production

PlantingGuide.companionPlants: Works well with maize, beans, and shade-tolerant crops
